section.title: Managing and Monitoring JAIN SLEE Deployable Units
View JAIN SLEE Deployable Unit Summary
section.para: In the top, at the summary section, some details regarding the Deployable Unit can be seen, such as the Type, Parent Component (JSLEE Server) and the date it was deployed on, in Description.

section.title: Monitor JAIN SLEE DU Availability over time
section.para: By accessing the MONITOR tab it's possible to see a graph showing the availability of the deployable unit over time.

figure.title: &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE Deployable Unit Availability View.

textobject.para: &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE Deployable Unit Availability View.

note.title: Deployable Unit Availability Feature
note.para: For a deployable unit, availability refers to whether the DU was or not installed. It only works for deployable units with the same name.

section.title: List Component IDs
section.para: The only operation available for Deployment Units is to view the IDs of the components that it contains, it can be done by executing the List Component IDs operation.

note.para: As any operation on &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM;, this operation can be scheduled for a later time, have a defined timeout and/or include additional notes.

section.para: Clicking on the SCHEDULE executes (if Immediately is selected) or schedules the operation. After being executed, it's shown in HISTORY, Completed Operations. Clicking on it shows the result(s).
